LanguageData.VFE_Scarecrow.label: опудало
LanguageData.VFE_Scarecrow.description: Людиноподібна фігура з сіна, одягнена в старий одяг, щоб відлякувати тварин.
LanguageData.VFE_Scarecrow_Blueprint.label: scarecrow (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_Scarecrow_Blueprint_Install.label: scarecrow (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_Scarecrow_Frame.label: scarecrow (building)
LanguageData.VFE_Scarecrow_Frame.description: A humanoid figure made out of hay, dressed in old clothes to deter animals in a large radius. Small animals will be too afraid to approach.
LanguageData.VFE_Sprinkler.label: поливалка
LanguageData.VFE_Sprinkler.description: Пристрій для автоматичноо поливу. Посилює ріст навколишніх рослин.
LanguageData.VFE_Sprinkler_Blueprint.label: sprinkler (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_Sprinkler_Blueprint_Install.label: sprinkler (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_Sprinkler_Frame.label: sprinkler (building)
LanguageData.VFE_Sprinkler_Frame.description: A water sprinkler, providing an area around it with water. Enhances the growth of surrounding plants.
